name: Pogo Pete
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy.  Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5! Original version: Patrick Strassen - Tynesoft - Commodore 16/Plus4, 1985

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Original Story: You control a young boy, on a pogo-stick, named 'Pogo Pete'. Some children have decided to build an adventure playground in the street. You must try out all the obstances in the playground and you have to pick up all the released balloons. You move Peter over 8 screens, but you can't fall to the ground. You have 1 minute to complete each level, but if you falls, the clock stops.

Controls on original machine:
Start the game: Start key
Move: Cursor LEFT and RIGHT
Jump higher: B
Pause level: Start key 

Controls in the browser:
Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow LEFT and RIGHT
Jump higher: X
Pause level: Enter

Original game (Commodore 16/Plus4 ) link: https://plus4world.powweb.com/software/Pogo_Pete
